Reporting Bugs
To help make Gabber a more stable and useful program, we encourage you to submit bug reports to SourceForge 's Bug Reporting system.
Authors
Gabber was written by:
Julian "x-virge" Missig julian@jabber.org
Dave "DizzyD" Smith dave@jabber.org
Brandon "brandon2" Lees brandon@aspect.net
Konrad Podloucky konrad@crunchy-frog.org
Dave "bigdave" Lee
Thomas "temas" Muldowney temas@box5.net
To find more information about Gabber, please visit its web site.
This manual was written by Eliot "e-t" Landrum eliot@landrum.cx. Please email all comments and suggestions regarding the manual to the author.
